title: Saturn Transit in the 7th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting your seventh house brings a serious, karmic phase to partnerships, marriage, and public dealings. Relationships are tested for commitment, responsibility, and realism. Superficial bonds weaken, while mature, long-term alliances gain strength. Delays or distance may appear, but they clarify expectations and boundaries. This transit teaches you patience in cooperation and fairness in agreements, helping you build partnerships that are stable, dependable, and resilient over time.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: You become more cautious in dealing with others.

sections.heading: Career
points: Client relationships require patience and consistency.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Marriage or committed bonds face reality checks.
Older or mature partners influence outcomes.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Legal or contractual expenses may arise.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Patience is tested in one-to-one dealings.

closing: Saturn here refines your partnerships. What survives this phase becomes dependable, balanced, and built to last.
